Instance.description: A class defining a combination of object slot types. ObjectSets - Represents which slot types an object goes into. SlotSets - Represents which slot type a slot is. More Details - https://confluence.ea.com/pages/viewpage.action?spaceKey=SIMS4&title=Slots+and+Slotting

Tunable.name: allow_distant_relative_intersection
Tunable.description: True if objects slotted to this slot should be allowed to overlap with other objects that are slotted to a common ancestor, or slotted to something slotted to a common ancestor, etc.

Tunable.name: client_only_parenting
Tunable.description: True if the object being slotted should bypass much of the server side parenting and hierarchy as possible..

Tunable.name: custom_error_text
Tunable.description: Override error text to display if an object fails placement due to not matching this slot

Tunable.name: dont_propagate_ops
Tunable.description: True if object operations performed on the parent should not transfer to children slotted to this slot. EG: If the parent is deleted or moved, the child is simply unparented and remains on the lot in place.

Tunable.name: force_full_footprint_checks
Tunable.description: True if the object being slotted needs to do full footprint checks with the parent, children, siblings and environment..

Tunable.name: parent_snaps_to_child
Tunable.description: True if, when the user picks up and moves an object with this slot around, the parent will snap to available nearby unslotted children. The child is slotted to the parent in-place (not moved)

Tunable.name: prevent_sibling_intersection
Tunable.description: True if objects slotted to this slot should not follow the normal rule of blindly allowing intersections with other objects slotted to the same parent at different heights.

Tunable.name: search_radius
Tunable.description: Number of meters to search for co-located slots with different orientations.

TunableList.name: slot_types
TunableList.description: The slot types comprising this set.

Tunable.name: user_facing
Tunable.description: True if this slot will be available for slotting objects by the player through livedrag or Build buy. False if its only through gameplay interactions.
